actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide funeral transportation and living expense benefits to the families of deceased prisoners of war.
short_title: Funeral Transportation and Living Expense Benefits Act

summary.text: Funderal Transportation and Living Expenses Benefits Act - Provides funeral transportation and living expense benefits to the families of deceased members of the Armed Forces classified as prisoners of war or as missing in action and whose remains shall have been returned to the United States after January 27, 1973. Specifies the family members eligible for such benefits.

titles.title: Funeral Transportation and Living Expense Benefits Act
A bill to provide funeral transportation and living expense benefits to the families of deceased prisoners of war.
